description:
This studio is in a wonderful area next to River Side Drive with an amazing view! I see the sunset every night and the Moon....FROM MY PILLOW. My place is close to The City College of New York, Fairway Market, and Londel's Supper Club. You’ll love my place because of THE VIEW! the comfy bed, the kitchen, the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. A short hoot mid-town, Chelsea, West Village. Short walk to Starbucks.

the space is large enough and compact. I great Paul McCobb desk facing the window. I love my vintage Herman Miller recliner and many designer elements to give my guest the feel of a well designed home.

I will hand the guest the key as I like to meet them in person.

I am available 24/7 with any questions or concerns or suggestions. I am a New Yorker and can provide information to the best New York has to offer.

Next to Riverside Drive. A nice walk to the park. A new Starbuck just opened on 125th Street! Easy subway access.

UBER, Taxi or the 1 train for a short ride to the heart of NYC

Respect my home as if it were your own.
name: New York City Mid-Cen. Modern Apt. THE VIEW!!!
